title: General RPG Map Configurations
description:
This tool will let you edit data related to your page's title and site navigation. Backing up your existing JSON file before making changes or replacing it is highly recommended.

You can use the clipboard button at the bottom right to copy the generated JSON to your clipboard, then paste it into your own 'settings.json' file, located in the 'assets/data' folder.

pageName.title: Your Map Page's Title
pageName.description: What appears in the browser's tab when visiting your page.

forumURL.title: Your Forum's URL
forumURL.description: e.g., https://myurl.com/ (Leave blank if you don't have one)

wikiURL.title: Your Wiki's URL
wikiURL.description: e.g., https://myurl.com/wiki/ (Leave blank if you don't have one)
